title: The reason failing to send/receive multimedia message, the method to solve.
answer:
Popular name: the network state or signal is not good, resulting in multimedia message
sending failed.
Method to solve: resending it later
Refused by the network side, results in failing to send multimedia message.
Popular name: Because the network side busy and other reasons, cannot send multimedia
message. Results in transmission failure.
Method to solve: resending it later
Refused by the network side, results in failing to send multimedia message.
Popular name 1:the wrong number information of receiver results sending failed.
Method 1: check the number of receiver, if wrong, please resend it after modified.
Popular name 2: the edited multimedia message is more than 300KB, resulting sending
failed.
Method 2: delete some content of the multimedia to less than 300KB, and then resend it.
Whether it is debiting.
Popular name: debt results sending failed.
Method: pay the fees and then resend it.
The phone storage is not enough, cannot receiving multimedia message.
Popular name: storage is not enough, resulting sending failed.
Method: release the storage to the rest space more than 300K.
